title: LoL In Game Screen Flickering
body: My League of legends screen is flickering when I change it to full-screen mode. My fps drops when I turn it to borderless but there is no flickering, and I don't know how to fix it. I tried re-installing and the hextech repair tool but nothing seems to be working. Also, my pbe account has the same glitch as well. So I don't know what do so can someone please help me.

replies.body: I wonder if this is somehow related to an outdated graphics driver since this is more related to how your pc is rendering the graphics rather than patch/client related which would affect 100% of players. Double check for any drivers you might have missed as well as checking to make sure the game dvr feature is still turned off. If nothing seems to help, hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if they can look through your game logs to see what's wrong.

Do you have a Freesync monitor? Freesync has a plethora of flickering issues in a lot of titles. 

I you're on windows 10, find the LoL _**game**_ client with the old logo. Should be in a path like this: 

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.196\deploy

Right click on the .exe -> Properties -> Compatibility -> Check Disable Fullscreen optimizations

That reportedly helped people who are on the new RS3 version of windows 10 that were having problems with stuttering and other weird issues.
Thank you for the help from both of you, I was able to fix my league client and play fine. Thanks, a lot I appreciate it!
For some reason on the practice tool, the screen isn't flickering which is weird and stupid.
